channel.title: London Cryptocurrency Conference - Ticket Competition!
channel.description:
Our Operations Manager Bjørn Alsos will be one of the speakers at The London Cryptocurrency Show on April 14th (http://www.londoncryptocurrencyshow.com). To celebrate this we’re giving away two free tickets and the chance to hang out with members of the BitBay team!
Simply post your answer below to the following question for a chance to win:
**"What important BitBay fact should Bjørn not forget to mention at the conference?"**
Send us your suggestions! We’ll pick our 2 favourites and announce the winners here on Tuesday, April 10th.
